channel.title: CVE Feed for Biplob Adhikari -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Biplob Adhikari -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37122|2024-07-22T19:14:37.524Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- accordions
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari Accordions allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Accordions: from n/a through 2.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37120|2024-07-22T09:38:43.846Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari Tabs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Tabs: from n/a through 4.0.6.
